values:
the golden grizzlies did great on horseback for their first show!! 
by this i mean, the OU equestrian team rocked the house at the WMU meet.  we got reserve champion!!! (which means second place out of all the schools)  and our amazing katie krauss got reserve champion high point rider!!! (which means she got 2nd place out of 152 riders)  w00t!! good job girls....i love you all. good start to the season. hopefully we'll do as well/better at this weekends U of M show.
other than that...life has been pretty crazy. i'm so busy with horses, school, and my social life and yet there's always so much more i need to do. matthew took me to see breaking benjamin and evans blue on tuesday. that was kickass. yay for me for surviving the moshpit area this time!! nothing like having 300 lb. shirtless, hairy men falling into you. lol.
matthew and i had our 2 year anniversary earlier this month. that was pretty amazing. he took me to the nicest restaurant ever and didn't think twice about treating me to our $91 meal....the best filet mignon ever!!! and Lord knows....i've eaten a lot of cows in my life, so i'd know what the best is.
oh yeah....and i've got a wicked bad cold right now. yay!!
so anyway....like i'm sure you know...i'm busy as hell and i need to work on my paper that's due tomorrow....and study for my 2 exams i have tomorrow....

so....i threw out my back last night. ouch...that hurt a lot. i don't know how many muscles i pulled....but i hope it heals quickly. i have things to do. so yeah....i'm not allowed to do much of anything til my back heals. what fun! not.
going to gigantour on sunday...hmm.
i have a paper due on friday that i haven't started. i probably shouldn't be updating my lj then. meh.
i like my new razr phone....but is it just me, or does it lose charge fast?
my mom's  being a bitch. but for all of those who know me...you're probably saying "what's new?" yeah, i know. i've nearly reached the end of my rope. but...how much longer will i hold on? how many more days, weeks, or years will i keep hanging on even though my hands are bleeding from rope burn? i tire of this shit. and no...this isn't suicidal. i have a lot to live for and i know that. however, this is about living. just not whether or not to live. just....where? because here....just ain't cuttin it. and i can't take much more.
how about this...
<3  I'll stay with you
The walls will fall before we do
Take my hand now
We'll run forever
I can feel the storm inside you
I'll stay with you

Fooled by my own desires
I twist my fate
Just to feel you
But you, turn me toward the light
And you're one with me
Will you run with me?  <3

i guess it would be nice of me to update this....it's been over two months. sorry about that.
my life has been very busy and it will only get busier. classes aren't too bad...i can't slack as much as i did in high school cause i have a scholarship to keep.other than school, i am basically at the barn 5 days a week now. i'm riding a lot...so that's good. but it's also very tiring to ride multiple times in one day...several days in a row. i'll just be one rippling muscle in another month. lol. i am an official member of the OU equestrian team. watch out u of m...the golden grizzlies are coming and they're coming on horseback!!! lol. other than all that stuff i try to squeeze in time for matthew, my family, and my friends. although, i find myself being stretched thinner than i should be and it seems like everyone and everything is pulling me a different way and it's a little frustrating. especially when people don't seem to realize i'm doing my best. i'm sorry that i ride a lot...heaven forbid its my passion and i want to get very good at it since i hope it will be my career. and i have to work every frickin day to pay off the free lessons my trainers give me. I'M SORRY!!! i'm not trying to ignore anyone...really. especially you matthew....i love you more than life so please cooperate with me throughout all this. no matter how hard i try it seems like everyone is still mad at me. i'm sorry ashley that i don't want to fucking join bells and choir right now...i kind of show on the weekends so it's hard to be in 2 places at once. shmerka! 
see, aren't you glad i posted.
i hope everyone else is doing well. it's still so weird that all my friends are so spread out at different schools. but it sure feels good not to be at waterford mott h.s. 
alright, homework time.
<3 where did i go wrong, i lost a friend
somewhere along in the bitterness <3

someone please tell me why is it that everytime i think things are going to be okay.... they start falling apart again.  a week or 2 ago i had the worst night of my life and thought everything i worked so hard to keep was going to throw me out on the street. but then, daddy apologized...and i thought things would be okay.  i tried harder than ever to make things work.  the concert last night created a little bump...but when i got home today, things were okay.  and then we were discussing my schedule. and i reminded my mother that commuting won't be bad since i won't commute often....matthew has a dorm and i plan on being in it several nights a week.  but that was too much for them to handle.  "you can't go sleeping around campus andrea.  don't flaunt your lifestyle in this household."  EXCUSE ME? who says that to their daughter. wtf mom. so my dad said if that's what i want to do, i better start packing my bags and not be a part of this household. 
this isn't what i want.  can't you fucking see that?
apparantely not. 
luckily, i still have some time to figure things out.  
that jones bottle cap is starting to look more true each day.
i love you matthew

"I never knew
I never knew that everything was falling through
That everyone I knew was waiting on a queue
To turn and run when all I needed was the truth
But that's how it's got to be
It's coming down to nothing more than apathy
I'd rather run the other way than stay and see
The smoke and who's still standing when it clears"

it feels good to be graduated.  i never have to battle those crowded hallways filled with countless ebonic-screaming negroes again. hoo-rah. 
anyways....a lot has happened since i last posted, but i don't feel like writing about all of it. the demon spawns that used to reside at haverhill are gone...so that makes things a lot better. the barn is already shaping up and things look great since we painted all the jumps saturday.  PURPLE!  YELLOW!  BLUE!  GREEN!  YAY!  i frickin love haverhill.  i love Jess and Katie and Laura.... we all have such good times.  ram's horn was full of laughs, as always.
riding Dark on saturday was amazing.  he was different to jump than Apachie...so i was a little off, but with practice i'll get better. it was just nice to ride a big horse and be riding in Lauras saddle.  my chaps should be coming sometime this week and then i'll be all set.
i hope i can come over thursday Jess.  i don't have to work until 3...so maybe i can.  
Matthew and i are doing amazing... as always.  lol.  i love you honey.
i have $2 to my name... wow. doing good.
i'm kind of tired of writing so see ya.
how about this...
"So take these words
And sing out loud
Cuz everyone is forgiven now
Cuz tonight's the night the world begins again

And it's someplace simple where we could live
And something only you can give
And thats faith and trust and peace while we're alive
And the one poor child that saved this world
And there's 10 million more who probably could
If we all just stopped and said a prayer for them"

hey everyone
spring break is pretty bad.  i start off by working really hard at the barn and earning $60 in 6 hours.  and then, somewhere between the office and my car, i lose it all.  maybe i dropped it and the wind took it away.  i don't know, but it's gone.  all gone.  as if i had money problems before, they're much worse now.  i saw abby after that though which is always good.  and she seemed to like her birthday gift.
easter was good.  i always like seeing my family and eating good food.  but i did sit in some tree sap.  nothing a little turpentine can't get out.  
matthew got some sad news on friday and left for st. joe today.  he'll be back later this week, but it makes my spring break continue downhill.
tomorrow, the real fun begins.  i'm getting my wisdom teeth out at 8:20 in the morning.  i really hope it goes well and it heals fast.  i don't want to look like a chipmunk forever.
i love you matthew
<3  "And I'll do anythin' you ever dreamed to be complete
Little pieces of the nothin' that fall
Oh May
Put your arms around me
What you feel is what you are
And what you are is beautiful
Oh May
Do you wanna get married, or run away?"  <3

hi
it's been a while, but not as long of a while as it sometimes is.  this weekend was good. i went dress shopping with some friends and found my prom dress. it's perfect. thanks darcy for picking it out. i couldn't have done it without you.  work was interesting on saturday....i saw  more blood coming out of a horse than you could every imagine. it was terrible. sunday was nothing but relaxation. i hardly left matts couch and we watched 3 movies on HBO. lol....yeah, i'm lazy. what can i say?
it's almost spring break. wOOt. i'm doing nothing fun. but oh well. 
my mom bothers me....a lot. but my brother however, i love dearly.
i need to do this assignment that was due 3 weeks ago.... ms. valentine's gonna kill me. oh well. 
i'm going to dairy queen in a little while and meeting my baby for some ice cream. that's two scoops of yum. we had our 1 1/2 year mark last week. oh how the times have changed in a year and a half...
so....i'm even more worried about my mother kicking me out now. she was saying how even though i'll be 18 i'm still not allowed to do what i want until i've moved out. rut roh.... that sounds bad. do you think she'll have a problem with all the things i'm planning? this doesn't look good... in order to be able to live my life, it seems i'll have to live it away from my family. 
*sigh*   i sound like such a drama queen when i write in this sometimes. 
i love you matthew
<3 the smile on your lips lets me know that you need me.... <3

shmerka derka
i'm soooo sick. and it sucks. i wanted to stay home today, but no.... i was "well enough to be out last night" so i should be able to go to school today. whatever...you pick your poison i guess. 
what's been going on? hmm... i've just been trying to keep myself above from the overwhelming of senioritis that's trying to take hold...i want to get through high school with a semi-good GPA. but i fucking hate high school. every single thing about it sucks. well, except turkey slop and cream of potato soup.  i did discover today, that screaming "columbine!" in crowded areas gets people to move quickly. i wonderif that's against the law or something...like screaming "fire!" in crowded areas. oh well. 
so...matthew got us tickets for OZZFEST!!!!!!!!!!!!! yeah, that's right. we're going. the tickets were quite pricey...but oh well. it will be worth it.
so i'm starting to regret my decision to slack off and stop caring about school. i'm kind of regretting my decision to not even apply to MSU...but there was no possible way i could do that and still have what i love. it just wouldn't work. so, in some ways, i don't regret it because being at OU will be wonderful...i truly can't wait for that. but...i don't think i can ever be a vet now. and that makes me kind of sad. since i'm always taking care of the hurt horses at the barn, it makes me realize how much i really wanted to do that for a living. but oh well, hopefully the choices i've made will prove to be better in the long run. 
so i have no money. and now my mom won't let me borrow money. so, does anyone have any ideas for how the hell i am gonna pay for my prom dress???? i need to get it...soon. but...i don't know how to work this out. my mom  said i can find one for $40-$60...is she on crack? i hate it when she is such a fuck-tard.
why does it seem like people i thought really really cared about me only seem to care about me when it's convenient for them. whatever. i've tried... i know some people are still always there. well, some person i guess i should say.
i have a feeling that everything is about to change. not yet, but soon. and i can hardly contain my excitement.
i love you matthew.
<3  "...the sinners are much more fun. only the good die young"  <3

how's everyone doing?
i'm fine, but i can't even put it into words how heavy my heart is with sympathy of what's going on. it's not right and i'm sorry.
ice days are nice....
i need to go to the doctors
40 year old virgin was very good. thanks darcy
i love you matthew.
<3 no more, please <3

hmm....
went to port huron yesterday. it was nice to see my grandma and grandpa. my great aunt also came over. lots of talking....some of it was boring. then i went to visit my cousin, erin at work. she works in a salon and i went to keep her company for a while. i hadn't seen her engagement ring yet, and it was gorgeous!! then....as a spur of the moment decision.....i decided to become blond. yeah.....i'm blond now. craziness.
anyways.... i have to go to the foot doctor later. blah. but then matthew's coming over, which is good.
alright, enough of this.  i love you matthew
<3  shmerka derka <3

yeah....so i haven't written in this damn thing since before christmas. i never seem to want to say anything. i used to write in this all the time, but i guess i don't really care anymore. but i'll try harder...maybe. 
um... it's mid-winter break. it's been going fine i guess. bell overnight on friday was fun...all the churchies together again...it was a good feeling. work was unbelievably cold on saturday, but i survived. sunday my sister and i performed our dance....we got an uncountable number of compliments...which felt real good. 
hmm.... matthew and i rocked out for hours playing guitar hero. i really suck at it, but it's addicting anyways. i guess it's a healthy addiction when compared to coke and heroine. but maybe not as healthy as being addicted to...carrots. except you turn a tint of orange when you eat too many carrots. oh well, you can just tell people you used a bad sunless tanner.
tomorrow we're being kicked out of our house so we can get our floors redone. we've been in our house a little over a year and we already need to get our hardwood floors redone. lame. that's what happens when people don't do a job well the first time around. oh well, i get to go play rummy for a day with my grandparents. 
man....i need to find my tax things that came in the mail a month ago. my w-4's or whatever they're called. i need to do something with those before the IRS hunts me down, but i don't know where they are. i also need to find my orientation card....i think i was supposed to send that back already. oops. 
yep, nothing else to say i guess....i'm bored.
i love you matthew
"And in the air the fireflies
Our only light in paradise
We'll show the world they were wrong
And teach them all to sing along"
<3 that's enough<3

and he's gone.....
not really feeling the christmas spirit. this will be my first christmas without my grandmother....and it's tough. and it isn't even christmas yet. and we're waiting for my aunt pearl to die any day now.... so i may be going to a funeral soon.
ouch.
and i don't even have him here to help me.
i don't feel like writing anything else.

"So much for all the promises you made, they served you well
Now you're gone and they're wasted on me
So much for your endearing sense of charm, it served you well
Now it's just worn and wasted on me"

<3 i'm trying.... but being strong is hard when you're weak <3

hello
things are going alright. been busy with school and such. get a job working at the barn....i'm the owner's personal assistant. sounds pretty good.... back to getting paid to ride horses perhaps. it appears i only will be working on saturdays...maybe that will change. but hey, i'll take what i can get. 
thank God tomorrow is friday. i need a break from school for a few days. i wish it was almost christmas vacation. my ski boots don't fit me anymore....damn.
i really want some salami right now....good, thin sliced, deli salami. that's the stuff.
i hope everyone is doing alright. i'm doing pretty good for a prisoner. lol. only like....20 more days. it was worth it....for you, anything is worth it. and seeing the look on your face....how excited you were....you screaming the lyrics with me....you looking in admiration at your favorite band... you being all tough and somehow managing to drag me safely through the moshpit....you're so sweet....it was sooo worth it.
i love you honey
goodnight everyone. zZz time.
...a diamond in the rough...
<3  seek and you shall find  <3

matthew surprised me and came over for thanksgiving dinner!!! it was amazing. i had a wonderful time. my favorite thanksgiving ever. i have a lot to be thankful for this year. why i ever doubted you my love, is beyong me...and i'm sorry.
then i went shopping the next day. ashley and i survived walking around in detroit without getting mugged. wOOt! i spent lots of money...and only have a little shopping left to do. went to canterbury village then went to olive garden for dinner. good times.
i definitely have my car taken away...until further notice. so, a lesson to all...there are consequences when you intentionally disobey your parents. oh well. matthew came to visit me on saturday. it was nice....but my family bothers the hell out of me.
went to ionia christmas today. it was okay. lots of food... got sick on the way home. a joy, as always.
back to school...back to school....to prove to dad that i'm not a fool...
"Well she wants to live her life
Then she thinks about her life
Pulls her hair back, as she screams
"I don't really wanna live this life"
<3 yours truly <3

mmm....
went to the disturbed concert last night.....it was fucking amazing. being down on the floor about 3 yards away from the stage....things got pretty violent to say the least. and i'm not so sure i'm tough enough to handle being down there in a metal concert like that. at least i lasted through several songs until i turned to matthew and said "i can't take much more" and then got knocked so hard in the head by a crowd surfer that i only remember a blur of matthew dragging me through the mosh pit to safety. thank you honey....
disturbed.....was....so unbelievably good. after getting to a safer plave, we were still killer close and had the best view. it was amazing. i'm not very good with words and i can't seem to find the words to explain how orgasmic this concert was. so, for further details, visit my darlings livejournal entry: cowboy_dreamer. yeah, i got home an hour past my curfew last night...and i think i get my car taken away for a month. it was worth it. the consequences, the bruises...it was all worth it.
so...today....when i was loading my massive portfolio into my car, i dropped my car key. now, with regular people, they would bend over and pick up their key. but in the life of andrea, you have the worst luck ever and you happened to be parked over a sewer/storm drain that day. my car key fell down the fucking drain. yeah....true story. who the fuck actually thinks this kind of shit happens? well, it does....to me. and since i'm one of the most intelligent people to walk this earth, i don't have a spare key. so i'm going to the saturn dealership with my dad tomorrow morning to get another key cut for my car. cool, eh? i'm what you'd call a very unlucky dumbass.
but a very unlucky dumbass that attended the worlds best concert last night with the worlds best boyfriend. so...life is still good.
enough of this.....i love you matthew.
i love you disturbed....you guys put on an awesome concert.
<3 ridiculously amazing <3

yeah....so i never update this thing....and i'm only doing it because i was literally just begged to do so.
right now i'm about to study some more AP biology. i don't know why though....i don't think i'll pass the test tomorrow anyways no matter what.
life has been crazy. i got accepted to OU and got my first scholarship to there ($12,000 for 4 years) i'm pretty excited. it's the first glimmer of hope that i'll be leaving hell in august.
i'm struggling with money problems, as always. i don't know how i'll be able to afford the disturbed tickets i purchased with daddy's credit card...but i'll figure something out. at least i don't have to worry about the car repairs to my front end since ben is paying for that since he's the loser that hit me. lol.....oh ben.
saw 2 was soooooo creepy. it had me on the edge of my seat, cringing, and breaking matt's hand. but it was marvelous and everyone should see it.
i'm doing much better this week coping with the death of my grandma. it's hard though.....i think this kind of thing takes a long time to get over. but....it's a work in progress i guess.
Matthew and i are doing wonderful, as always. we had a good weekend together carving pumpkins and seeing scary movies....playing dead things in the haunted tunnel. all those fun halloween things. now it's almost time for the next weekend...and that's happy.
back to biology. and then....bed.
random word(s) of the day: i love whipped cream in a can. it's a good dessert topper....real yummy on pumkin pie...
i love you matthew....
no song lyrics today.....too lazy
<3 jigga' what? <3

mmm....wow.
matt just left...and we just celebrated out 1 year anniversary. it was wonderful. i had him over for a surprise dinner...that i worked very hard on all day. i made lasagna (none of that prego shit...i made the sauce myself) and it was perfect. i was so worried i wouldn't have everything done in time...but it worked out soo perfect...sparkling grape juice and all. we had a romantic candlelit dinner with the 2 of us...it was nothing short of amazing. 
the rest of the weekend was good too. hung out at OU and matt's house on friday...went to his house saturday afternoon. we took a walk...hopped some fences, trespassed in a construction/hard hat area and ended up at a playground. lol. it was lots of fun. then i babysat for almost 4 hours....but the kids were in bed the whole time. so i got paid $23 to sit and watch tv...not bad. 
i need to work on my AP biology...i do actually want to pass this class...even though my grade wouldn't indicate someone striving for a passing grade.
"Would you be my one true friend
Stick with me through thick and thin
If the roof was old and the rain came in
Honey would you stand by me"

I love you matthew
<3 forever <3

shmerka.....

so...i can't stand her....i really can't. she's a terrible person....and and unbelievably terrible mother. what kind of mother pulls this shit? mine does....congrats to me. fuck this shit.... she doesn't know the damage she's doing....i don't think i'll be visiting much from kentucky...have fun not knowing your grand kids. but, i'll be the bigger person.... "forgive her father, for she knows not what she does..."

topic change.... AP biology.....grade is slipping further since i got a beautiful D on today's quiz. well, at least some things are looking up. hah.

michele made me smile today....which was hard to do. starbucks was nice yesterday with darcy and erik. i can't believe you ate 2 of those gross donuts erik......

at least i get to see matthew tomorrow.... but if i see him this weekend, i can't see him monday.....(so she says)

"you eat up my heart and all the little parts
your star is so sharp
it leaves me jagged holes
i make myself sick just to poison you"

<3  sweet redemption....where are you??  <3

yeah.....so i basically haven't written in this in like....several months. but oh well. i guess i'll start trying to write in it a little more since it looks friggin' awesome since matthew spiffed it up.
hmm...what's new with me. i'm still desperately seeking a job...and haven't had any luck. school is alright...AP biology is kicking my ass.....majorly. i got a D+ on our first test....yay. i used to think i was semi-intelligent before this class. 
matthew and i will be celebrating our 1 year anniversary a week from today. isn't that amazing?? 
i was really sick last week. i got sick a week from last thursday...and it just sucked. i was crazy sick. then i got pink eye after homecoming. homecoming was awesome...(piercing look) it really was. it was my best year of homecoming.
i can't think of what else to write. hey darcy....your toothbrush now has it's own little labeled bad in the drawer. you are now free to make spur of the moment decisions to sleep at my house anytime.
i love you so much matthew.
"I'll be your crying shoulder,
I'll be love's suicide.
I'll be better when I'm older,
I'll be the greatest fan of your life."
<3 mmm....yeah. <3

been a while, eh?

matthew lives here now. i'm happy and so is he. school's out. hoorah. i bought a car....$3500... it's a black 98 saturn. it's quite lovely and i'm so damn proud of it because i bought it with my own money. well, except for the $1000 of it i owe my daddy. but other than that, i bought it. too bad i can't drive it.....for another week. oh well.

not too much to say....i start working tomorrow. looking for job #2.....and i'm quitting working at the barn. which is technically job #2 right now, but i'm not counting it because it's the crappiest job ever.

the ACT sucked some major ass saturday. wouldn't you say?

guess who's boyfriend just bought 2 tickets to the green day concert september 11.....oh yeah.....that would be my darling boyfriend. the best in the world.

<3 i love you matthew <3

i'll write more the next time i feel like writing something in here.

weekend was lovely. friday night with matthew....we watched star wars episode v...the empire strikes back. it was sweet. saturday....matthew came over for lunch...did some homework...then we went to his house. darcy picked us up...went to mongolian with some friends for a birthday dinner. loads and loads of fun....good food. then went to starbucks.....yum. chilled with matthew for the rest of the day....watched part of return of the jedi. more good stuff. church on sunday....another goodbye. but only for 6 days..... not too bad.

going to st. joe again on saturday....soooo excited. i get to see matthew graduate. i'm gonna try to see if i can stay with him and his mom at his house....but...since i'm a dirty whore, my mom probably won't let me. in that case, i'll be staying with matts dad and stepmom, his sisters and his grandparents in a hotel.

meh....tired of typing.

<3 i love you matthew <3

'sup gangstas (haha....sooo white)

last week i was sick. and i'm sick now too....i have a bad cold now. hoorah.

hmm....i guess i'll talk about my weekend. don't remember what i did friday. on saturday i went to erik's party. lots and lots of fun....glad i went. since i didn't work on saturday...i got to work crazy long on sunday. i was working with horses for 9 hours. luckily, i like horses a hell of a lot more than people...so it's ok. a kid kicked a ball at me while i was walking nugget (the pony i took to the party) and nugget bucked and kicked me. ouch. at least he didn't kick the kid....although i wish he had so the kid would learn his lesson. but then i would have had a lot of paperwork to fill out and i'd be in a lot of trouble...and could be out of a job.

i want to go to abby's house. maybe i'll go there tomorrow or thursday. i'll go whatever day i'm not at the barn.

going on a field trip thursday... w00t! friday's gonna rock. i'm going to mongolian barbeque with muh friends for my birthday...sorta.  it'll be fun. then matthew's coming home!!!! and on saturday, he and i are celebrating my b-day. on sunday....i might be going to the wild horse and burrow auction. it will be loads of fun.

i love you matthew

random word(s) of the day: where in the world is carmen san diego?

<3 "Lay still like the dead
From the razor to the rosary
We could lose ourselves
And paint these walls in pitchfork red" <3

so....i haven't written in here in...forever. my deepest apologies. (not really)

um....i guess i'll just pick up with prom. i traveled to st. joe on saturday (not this past saturday, last saturday) and finally got to see matthews town. damn it's cute. i loved it so much. finally saw his house....saw his mom again...met his kitty...saw his little-boy bedroom. (tehe) and all that fun stuff. he looked so damn good....  we took lots of pictures in his front yard...right in front of a really yummy smelling lilac bush. chris and lindsey arrived (i finally got to meet the wonderful prople i've heard so much about) i adored them instantly and we all went out to dinner at pumphouse grill. it was yummy. then we went down to the pier....lake michigan is beautiful....especially when you're walking on the pier with the one you love most. then we headed to the dance. it was a lot of fun. after the dance we went to chris' house to watch house of flying daggers. we basically all fell asleep....but matthew got me home by 2....just like he promised my mother he would. next morning, me and matt and our mothers went out to breakfast. then i had to put st. joe to my rudder and head home....but i'll be going back on the 28th. hoorah. but that's a story for another entry.

on friday, matt came home (yay!!) we hung out for a few hours....just chillaxin (haha.....darcy) saturday, me and my sista cleaned out mom's car.... our cheap mothers day gift. then we went to the store to get her some flowers....and decided to go shopping for ourselves as well. tehe. then matt came over....we got our prom pics developed....and got asked if we just got married. oh man did that make me smile. i think it made matt get nervous and anxious for a topic change. we had dinner...played some sims....watched i, robot. then...said goodbye for 13 days. damn. last time we have to be apart for so long.

sunday, my brother graduated form michigan state college of engineering. i'm so damn proud of him. the ceremony was long and boring...and it was freezing in there. then we had a little reception at our house. it was fun.

worked at the barn yesterday.....for now pay of course. did a lot of exhausting work with a pride-cut gelding. it was fun though. my baby looked like he's been putting on some weight. oh well though...he's adorable no matter what.

yeah.....that was a long entry. i'm done for a while.

<3.....take me back to where the music hit me. life was good, love was easy. <3

hello

matt and i had a lovely weekend together (as to be expected.) he was the best man at his grandparents' 50th anniversary vow renewal. he looked soo good. and his toast...nothing short of breathtaking. had lots of fun at his aunts house with his huge family.....they're all so damn nice. ate too much pizza though....and laughed at too many of dustin's lame jokes. oh well...it was lots of fun. matt will be home friday afternoon....yay. we're getting spoiled....but we deserve it.

hope everyone had a good easter. mine was purty good. got to see my port huron family....usually do on holidays. got to see the new baby john. dang he was cute. and it was chloe's 2nd birthday....so that was fun.

going to the barn tomorrow. gonna do lots of work...and see my horse. i'm going with my friend val....she's moving to arizona on april 9th. trying to spend as much time with her as i can. i can't wait to get out to the barn and ride...although i probably won't even get to ride my horse. oh well....i hope the weather's nice again.
